metadata.title: org.bouncycastle: Use of Incorrectly-Resolved Name or Reference (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Bouncy Castle Java Cryptography APIs. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a use of incorrectly-resolved name or reference issue when resolving domain names over an SSL socket that was created without an explicit hostname, such as in the HttpsURLConnection() function. If endpoint identification is enabled, this flow allows an attacker to trigger hostname verification against a DNS-resolved address.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
org.bouncycastle-bctls is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
